//privacy Privacy Policy Our application respects the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our mobile application. Please read this Privacy Policy Carefully. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH THE TERMS OF THE PRIVACY POLICY, PLEASE DO NOT ACCESS THE APPLICATION. We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time and for any reason. We will alert you about any changes by updating the Privacy Policy. You are encouraged to periodically review this Privacy Policy to stay informed of updates. You will deemed to have been made aware of, will be subject to, and will be deemed to have accepted the changes in any revised Privacy Policy by our continued use of the application after the date such revised Privacy Policy is posted. We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect via the Application depends on the content and materials you see and includes: Demographic and other personally identifiable information (such as your name, email address, contactnumber and CNIC) that you voluntarily give to us when choosing to participate in various activities related to the Application, such as chat, posting messages And Making profiles to keeping users personal information safe and secure. //help Help Here is a guide for this application users. How you can access this application and make best use of it. Some frequently asked questions related to this application are listed here. Which arrives in a users mind while using this application features. Client click on search beautician by turning on her location and can easily access nearby beautician and then send request by selecting different services and view the bill Client/beautician can just click on chat the contact is shown their simply select the contact and text her. If an application users can forget their login password, they can easily reset their password.on sign-in page their is a button of forget password by clicking this a new screen appears They will provide an email and receive the verification link their and do through this they can update password there If an application users want to update their password for security. They just go to the update profile and click on Change password new screen appears enter old password then enter new password and the password is easily updated. How can you search nearby beautician? How can you chat with booked beautician? How can client/beautician see live location/movement of each other? How can application users change their password when they forget it? How can application users update their password??? please enter a valid name please enter a valid mobile number please enter a valid email Min password length 6 character long Please enter a valid Name
